name: Cocktail Jalapeno Mussels
keywords: appetizer, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, jalapeño, mayonnaise, mussels
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons finely minced fresh or canned jalapeno peppers
1 tablespoon very finely minced sweet red peppers

recipeInstructions.text: Make sure the mussels are well drained. Place them in a bowl. Arrange the shells on a serving platter.
Mix the mayonnaise with the remaining ingredients. Fold into the mussels.
Place a mussel, well coated with the mayonnaise mixture, on each shell. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
